button.back-previous-step: Go back to the previous step

tool-tip.pass-des: Minimum 8 characters and maximum 12 characters in numbers, lower case letters, and special symbols

page-not-found.page-not-exist-description: The page you requested could not be found

page-register.placeholder-pass2: Enter 8 characters in numbers, special symbols
page-register.placeholder-email3: Enter your email to create a new account

page-reset.reset-pass-description: Enter your information to reset your password

dialog.title-reset-email: Password reset email has been sent to ‘%{email}’
dialog.content-description-1: Please check your inbox and click on the  button in the email.
dialog.content-description-2: If you do not see the email in a few minutes, check your Junk mail folder or Spam folder.
dialog.blocked-sending-email: Password reset email can be sent up to 5 times in a day.
dialog.title-reset-email-failed: Your password reset request to ‘%{email}’ could not be processed
dialog.content-failed-description-1: Email or name entered appears to be invalid. Please check them carefully.
dialog.content-failed-description-2: If both are correct, please contact us for Customer Support.

error-message.password-must-match: The Confirm Password does not match

sites.title: My Site List
sites.empty-list:
There are no registered sites 
Click <bold>"Add New Site"</bold> and register the site.

create-site.title: Add My Site
create-site.subtitle: Please register your site to use SaForus service.

storage.title: My Storage List
storage.add-storage-description: Click here to safely register the storage where the contents can be stored.
storage.empty-list:
There are no registered storages 
Click <bold>"Add New Storage"</bold> and register the storage.
storage.cancel-add-new: Adding a new storage information has been canceled.

delete-site.title: Do you really want to delete your '%{name}' site information?
delete-site.content: You can not search your previous tasks in the site once deleting this. You can use ‘Archive’ instead of ‘Delete’.
delete-site.agree-term: I have read and understood the notice above

delete-storage.title: Do you really want to delete your '%{name}' storage information ?
delete-storage.content: You can not search your previous tasks with the storage once deleting this. You can use ‘Archive’ instead of ‘Delete’.
delete-storage.agree-term: I have read and understood the notice above

api.400: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
api.404: The requested page is unavailable or, in some cases, doesn't exist.

login.400: Your information is incorrect. Please check again.

signup.400: Your information is incorrect. Please check again.

reset-password.400: Your information is incorrect. Please check again.

new-password.400: Your information is incorrect. Please check again.
new-password.404: The security token included in the request is invalid.

activation.400: Your information is incorrect. Please check again.
activation.404: The security token included in the request is invalid.

page-reset-done.title: Password changed!
page-reset-done.description: Your password has been changed successfully.

page-verify-email.title: Confirm your registration
page-verify-email.content-description-2: Please click the button below to activate your account.

page-register-done.content-description-1: We have sent you an email to ‘%{email}’.
page-register-done.content-description-2: Please check your email and confirm your registration to activate your account.
page-register-done.title: Thank you for your registration

page-register-completed.title: Registration completed!
page-register-completed.description: Your registration process is completed. You can login now.
